<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>PayEx Checkout is Awesome!</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        <div id=\"checkin\" />
        <script data-payex-hostedview=\"checkin\" src=\"%s\"></script>
        <script language=\"javascript\">
            payex.hostedView.consumer({
                container: \"checkin\",
                onConsumerIdentified: function(consumerIdentifiedEvent) {
                    console.log(consumerIdentifiedEvent);
                    payexsdk.onConsumerProfileRefAvailable(consumerIdentifiedEvent.consumerProfileRef);
                },
                onShippingDetailsAvailable: function(shippingDetailsAvailable){
                    console.log(shippingDetailsAvailable);
                },
                onError: function(error) {
                    console.error(error);
                    payexsdk.onIdentifyError(JSON.stringify(error));
                }
            }).open();
        </script>
    </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>PayEx Checkout is Awesome!</title>
    </head>
    <body>
        <div id=\"checkout\" />
        <script src=\"%s\"></script>
        <script language="javascript">
            payex.hostedView.paymentMenu({
                container: \"checkout\",
                onPaymentMenuInstrumentSelected: function(event) {
                    payexsdk.onPaymentMenuInstrumentSelected(JSON.stringify(event));
                },
                onPaymentCompleted: function(event) {
                    payexsdk.onPaymentCompleted(JSON.stringify(event));
                },
                onPaymentFailed: function(event) {
                    payexsdk.onPaymentFailed(JSON.stringify(event));
                },
                onPaymentCreated: function(event) {
                    payexsdk.onPaymentCreated(JSON.stringify(event));
                },
                onPaymentToS: function(event) {
                    payexsdk.onPaymentToS(JSON.stringify(event));
                },
                onError: function(error) {
                    payexsdk.onPaymentError(JSON.stringify(error));
                }
            }).open();
        </script>
    </body>
</html>
